qas.question: What Disney theme park will become the first to feature Marvel-specific attractions?
Because of a prior contract, what two Disney parks are barred from featuring Marvel characters?

answers.text: Walt Disney World and Tokyo Disney

qas.question: The contract with what non-Disney studio prevents some parks from using Marvel characters?
What Marvel movie featured Star-Lord and Gamora?
What movie features the characters Baymax and Hiro?

plausible_answers.text: Walt Disney World and Tokyo Disney

qas.question: What are the only two Disney parks allowed to have Marvel characters?

plausible_answers.text: Due to the licensing agreement with Universal Studios

qas.question: Why is Walt Disney unable to have characters such as Star-Lord appear?

plausible_answers.text: creating original Marvel attractions at their theme parks

qas.question: What does Universal Studios plan to do with their Marvel contract?

plausible_answers.text: the licensing agreement with Universal Studios

qas.question: What was signed after Disney purchased Marvel?
Because of the Universal Studios agreement, which Big Hero 6 characters are off limits for Disney?

context: Walt Disney Parks and Resorts plans on <b7_0>creating original Marvel attractions at their theme parks<b7_0/>, with <a0_0>Hong Kong Disneyland<a0_0/> becoming the first Disney theme park to feature a Marvel attraction. <b6_0>Due to <b8_0>the licensing agreement with <a2_0>Universal Studios<b8_0/><b6_0/><a2_0/>, signed prior to Disney's purchase of Marvel, <a1_0><b5_0>Walt Disney World and Tokyo Disney<b5_0/><a1_0/> are barred from having Marvel characters in their parks. However, this only includes characters Universal is currently using, other characters in their "families" (X-Men, Avengers, Fantastic Four, etc.), and the villains associated with said characters. This clause has allowed Walt Disney World to have meet and greets, merchandise, attractions and more with other Marvel characters not associated with the characters at Islands of Adventures, such as Star-Lord and Gamora from <a3_0>Guardians of the Galaxy<a3_0/> as well as <b9_0>Baymax and Hiro<b9_0/> from <a4_0>Big Hero 6<a4_0/>.
